an4.223:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has four qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an4.223:1.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and being ungrateful and thankless.
an4.223:1.4: An astute person … makes much merit. … Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and being grateful and thankful. …”
